title: Palazzone 2016 Grek Grechetto (Umbria)
description: Acacia, yellow stone fruit and herb are some of the aromas you'll find in this savory white. The crisp, linear palate offers yellow peach, Golden Delicious apple and bitter almond flavors alongside bright acidity.

title: Palazzone 2016 Terre Vineate  (Orvieto Classico Superiore)
description: This wine's alluring, delicate scents of white stone fruit, pressed wildflowers and almonds float out of the glass. The savory, linear palate offers mature yellow apple, Bartlett pear, chopped herb and hazelnut notes. Bright acidity gives it a crisp, pristine finish.

title: Pievalta 2016  Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore
description: Made from biodynamically grown grapes, this bright, elegant white offers delicate scents of spring wildflowers, orchard fruit and toasted nuts. The fresh, tangy palate offers white peach and tangerine flavors while a hint of almond-like bitterness backs up the finish.
region_1: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore

title: Primosic 2012 Oslavia Ribolla Gialla (Collio)
description: Orange-hued, this opens with mature yellow stone fruit, baked biscuit and toasted nut aromas. On the smooth palate, fresh acidity lifts dried apricot, orange rind and bitter almond flavors. A mineral note adds depth. It's unusual but intriguing.

title: R&A; Pfaffl 2017 Haid Grüner Veltliner (Weinviertel)
description: Ripe pear and green moss notes combine on the nose. The very light palate has a salty miso-like backdrop of yeasty richness, cut by lemon freshness. This is dry, honest, refreshing and moreish.

title: Ram's Gate 2015 Roberts Road Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description: This is an elegant, deceptively delicate wine that builds body and texture in the glass. Tangy orange and cranberry elements emphasize naturally high acidity and a mineral component of rose petal and dried herb.

title: RouteStock 2016 Route 29 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description: Slate and stone provide a mineral character to this white wine, fermented in both concrete egg and oak. Mouthfilling and youthful, it offers strong flavors of green apple amidst a steely, complex body of light-bodied weight.

title: Salentein 2015 Single Vineyard San Pablo Estate Chardonnay (Mendoza)
description: Woody aromas of apple and pear are what a quality Chardonnay should smell like. From one of Mendoza's coolest spots (San Pablo), this is a fleshy, well-built wine with a mix of baked apple, popcorn and woody flavors. A slight hint of white truffle and oxidation on the finish suggests that this at peak or just slightly past it. Drink now.

title: Schlosskellerei Gobelsburg 2017 Riesling (Kamptal)
description: An earthy touch combines with the ripe lemon-zest notes on the nose. The palate focuses purely on lemon with a lip-smacking juicy core of freshness. This is light, dry, tart and tingling with refreshment and verve.

title: Schwarzböck 2017 Gelber Muskateller (Niederösterreich)
description: Tender honeysuckle notes on the nose lead onto a lemony palate that is bright with freshness. Lemon sets the tone with zesty verve on the very light, dry, utterly refreshing and fragrant body.

title: Starmont 2017 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description: This is such an exuberantly fresh, focused and delicious wine. Floral as a strawberry patch in summer, it shows bright spicy flavors that lean into dried herb and blood orange with length and grace.

title: Stift Göttweig 2017 Furth Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
description: Ripe pear has a lovely white miso savoriness about it on the nose. The palate, on the other hand, is far more fruity than savory. The pear fruit is edged by bright lemon on the light dry palate but on the finish that lovely miso tang reappears.

title: Stift Göttweig 2017 Furth Riesling (Kremstal)
description: Heady citrus signals pleasure from the start. Tangerine, mandarin and pink grapefruit combine for a fruity zesty nose and palate. The body is streamlined, taut and light but with a pleasurable juicy vein of freshness and joy. This is light, dry and totally refreshing.

title: Talley 2015 Rincon Vineyard Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
description: This bottling is about as delicate as it gets for Pinot Noir in California, with light aromas of raspberry sorbet and licorice candy on the nose. There is compelling tension to the palate, where shy flavors of cranberry and hibiscus arise.

title: Tenute Pieralisi 2016 Villaia  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
description: This opens with enticing grapefruit, hawthorn and Bartlett pear aromas that carry over to the savory palate, along with an almondy finish and bright acidity. Drink through 2024.
region_1: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore

title: Umathum 2016 Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
description: A touch of reduction still hovers on the nose. The palate comes in with the freshness of tart just-ripe red cherries. Freshness pervades and sets a lighter breezier tone. Nothing clouds the dense but fresh fruit—a very honest, juicy red.

title: Victor Vineyards 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
description: Full body and firm tannins help give this flavorful and spicy wine good balance and an appetizing bite on the palate. Light touches of black pepper and clove in the aroma precede blueberry and black-cherry flavors and a moutheel that's firm and velvety.

title: Vignobles et Compagnie 2016 White (Côtes du Rhône)
description: Delicate notes of crushed stone and smoke accent pressed apple and pear on the nose of this dry white wine. The palate is surprisingly fresh and spry, brightened by sunny squirts of lime and lemon and integrated vanilla, hazelnut and spice notes. It finishes long, with a silken cling.

title: Waipara Springs 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Waipara Valley)
description: From one of the founding wineries in the Waipara region on the east coast of the south island, this is an enticing wine that's as focused on herbs and minerals as it is on fruit. Aromas of stalks, nettles, stones and wet hay mingle with ripe tropical fruit and apples. The medium-bodied palate is tightly wound, with focused acidity and a slightly chalky texture flowing into a long, salty citrus tang.

title: Weingut Frank 2017 Grüner Veltliner (Weinviertel)
description: Very appetizing, immediate notes of both fresh green and ripe juicy yellow pear make for an aromatic opening. They follow through on the light dry palate where a sage-tinged savoriness is joined by bright lemon. It is ideal aperitif material with its refreshing mouthwatering lightness.

title: Zahel 2017 White (Wiener Gemischter Satz)
description: Both green and red apple, earth and orange zest play on the nose. The light but expressive palate echoes these notions and backs them with a lightly phenolic texture and zesty freshness. This is a vivid, fresh and utterly versatile white, with a clean dry finish.

title: Zull 2016 Zweigelt (Niederösterreich)
description: The nose shyly hints at blueberries. The palate adds lovely, fresh and pristine red cherry. Together they make an elegant, fresh and sinuously fluid wine that charms effortlessly.

title: Château L'Ermitage 2017 Auzan Rosé (Costières de Nîmes)
description: Vibrant sour cherry-like acidity and delicate body make this dry rosé an especially invigorating thirst-quencher. Crisply concentrated with wild strawberry and raspberry flavors, it's silken yet spry, adapting seamlessly from poolside to the dinner table.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2014 Temptation Zinfandel (California)
description: This is a gutsy, spicy dry wine with intriguing black-pepper aromas, and beefy, lightly smoky flavors backed by plenty of blackberries. It has a firm texture suitable for the biggest proteins.

title: Andriano 2016 Finado Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
description: This wine's enticing green apple, citrus and spring blossom aromas follow through to its medium-bodied, savory palate, along with a note of nectarine zest. Fresh acidity and energizing mineral accents lift the finish.

title: Atalayas de Golbán 2014 Torre d'Golbán Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
description: Spicy berry aromas are ripe and exhibit integrated oak, earth and leather notes. A tight but bold palate with tension delivers bright berry and cherry flavors backed by a hint of chocolate on a balanced finish. Drink through 2022.

title: Billsboro 2016 Sawmill Creek Vineyards Cabernet Franc (Finger Lakes)
description: Fresh, green notes of dill and tomato leaf ride over a concentrated core of dense bramble berry and cherry in this single-vineyard wine. The palate is soft and approachable, with a mild grip of tannins to offer support.

title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2014 Sanct Valentin Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
description: This opens with yellow apple, citrus blossom and toasted oak aromas. Those segue over to the vibrant palate, along with tangy lemon drop and butterscotch hints.

title: Cecchi 2015 Riserva  (Chianti)
description: Ripe berry, star anise, forest floor and a whiff of toast lead the nose. On the round, chewy palate, supple tannins frame succulent flavors of black cherry, raspberry compote and dark baking spice. Drink through 2020. Terlato Wines International.

title: Cellers Unió 2014 Roureda Llicorella Gran Selecció Vitis 60 Red (Priorat)
description: Earthy berry aromas are dense and hint at prune, with a shortness of freshness. This is 78% Carignan and 22% Garnacha; it's strong boned, while flavors of plum and berry fruits are lightly salty. Similarly, the finish is salty, with lasting herbal plum and berry flavors.
